alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 20 at 5:42PM EST until February 23 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR POTENTIAL ICE JAM FLOODING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Additional flooding caused by an ice jam on the Grand River remains possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Michigan, including the following county, Ottawa. * WHEN...Through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Localized flooding of low lying areas and property along the Grand River will be possible. Rapid water level fluctuations may occur due to heavy ice cover on the river and possible ice jam formation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - As of Sunday afternoon, a significant ice jam has formed on the river near the highway 231 bridge, and is causing flooding in parts of Robinson Township. As this ice jam slowly moves downriver over the next few days, additional flooding is possible, including at some areas along the river that typically don`t have flooding problems.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
